sentences: Oleksin heameelga kui sa tulksid külastama.
context: Tuleks is the third-person singular present conditional form of the Estonian verb tulema (to come). It expresses a suggestion, possibility, or hypothetical situation. The word can be translated as 'should', 'would', or 'could' in English depending on context. In its connegative form (tuleksid), it would be used with negative verbs.
